66004007	Thilnung pakhatna chu Sakeibaknei ang a ni a, thilnung pahnihna chu Bâwng tuai ang a ni a, thilnung pathumna chuan Mihring hmêl ang a pu a, thilnung palina chu Mupui thlâwk lai ang a ni.
66004008	Tin, thilnung palite chuan thla paruk ṭheuh an nei a, an pâwn lam leh chhûng lam chu mitin a khat a. Tin, “Lalpa Pathian, Engkimtitheia, Awm tawha leh Awm mêka leh Lo la kal tûra chu, A thianghlim e, a thianghlim e, a thianghlim e,” tiin chhûn leh zân an châwl ngai lo.
66004009	Tin, thilnungte’n lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua chatuan chatuana nung renga chu ropuina an pêk a, an chawimawia lâwmthu an hrilh apiangin
66004010	Upa sawmhnih leh palite chu lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua hmâah chuan an bawkkhup a, chatuan chatuana nung renga chu chibai an bûk a. Tin, an lallukhumte chu lalṭhutthlêng hmâah chuan an dah a.
66004011	“Aw Lalpa, nangin engkim i siam a, i duh avânga siam leh lo awm an ni. Chuvângin ropuina te, Chawimawina te, thiltihtheihnate chu dawng tlâk i ni e,” an ti a.
66005001	Tin, lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua kut ding lamah chuan lehkhabu zial, chhûng lam leh pâwn lama ziak, chhinchhiahna pasariha chhinchhiah tlat ka hmu a.
66005002	Tin, vântirhkoh chak tak, aw ring taka, “Tunge lehkhabu zial hi hawnga a chhinchhiahna phelh tlâk awm?” tia tlângâuvin ka hmu bawk a.
66005003	Chutichuan vânah te, leiah te, lei hnuaiahte pawh lehkhabu zial chu hawng thei tumah an awm lo va, a hnung lam en thei pawh an awm hek lo.
66005004	Tin, lehkhabu chu chhiar tûra hawnga a chhûng lam pawh en tlâk tumah an awm loh avângin ka ṭap ta zawih zawih a.
66005005	Tin, upa zînga pakhat chuan ka hnênah, “Ṭap suh; ngaiteh, Sakeibaknei, Juda hnama mi, Davida Bulpui khân lehkhabu chu hawng tûr leh a chhinchhiahna pasarih phelh tûrin a hneh ta,” a ti a.
66005006	Ka han en a, tin, ngaiteh, lalṭhutthlêng laiah leh thilnung palite zîngah leh upate zîngah chuan Berâmno talh tawh hnu ang ding ka hmu a.Chu Berâmno chuan ki pasarih leh mit pasarih a nei a. Chûngte chu Pathian Thlarau pasarih, lei chung zawng zawnga tirh chhuahte chu an ni.
66005007	Tin, ani chu a lo kal a, lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua kut ding lama mi lehkhabu zial chu a la ta a.
66005008	Tin, lehkhabu zial chu a lâk veleh thilnung pali leh upa sawmhnih leh palite chu hla sakna hmanrua, ṭingṭang leh rangkachak berhbu, rimtuia khat keng ṭheuhvin Berâmno hmâah chuan an bawkkhup ta hlawm a. Chûng rimtuite chu mi thianghlimte ṭawngṭaina a ni.
66005009	Tichuan hla thar an sa a, “Nang, lehkhabu zial chu laa, A chhinchhiahnate phelh tlâk i ni e. Talhin i awm tawh a, Chi tina mi te, ṭawng tina mi te, mi tina mi te, hnam tina mite, Pathian tân i thisenin i lei tawh si a.
66005010	Tin, kan Pathian tân lalahte leh puithiamahte min siam a. Tin, leiah hian ro kan rêl ang,” tiin.
66005011	Tin, ka han en a, lalṭhutthlêng leh thilnungte leh upate vêlah chuan vântirhkoh tam tak aw ka hria a, an tam lam chu a sînga sîng hmun sîng tam tak leh a sânga sâng hmun sâng tam tak an ni.
66005012	Chûngte chuan aw ring takin, “Berâmno talh tawha hi, thiltihtheihna te, hausakna te, finna te, chakna te chawimawina te, ropuina te, fakna te dawng tlâk a ni e,” an ti a.
66005013	Tin, vân leh lei chung leh lei hnuai leh tuifinriat chunga thil siam tinrêng awmte leh chûngho chhûnga awm zawng zawngte chuan, “Lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua leh Berâmno hnênah chuan, malsâwmna te, chawimawina te, ropuina te, thiltihtheihna te, chatuan chatuanin awm rawh se,” an tih ka hre bawk a.
66005014	Tin, thilnung palite chuan, “Amen,” an ti a. Upa sawmhnih palite pawh chuan chatuan chatuana nung renga chu bawkkhupin chibai an bûk ta a.
66006001	Tin, Berâmnovin chhinchhiahna pasarih zînga pakhat a phelh lai chu ka hmu a. Tin, thilnung palite zînga pakhat chuan khawpui ri ang mai hian, “Lo kal la en rawh,” a tih ka hria a.
66006002	Tichuan ka han en a, tin, ngaiteh, sakawr vâr ka hmu a, a chunga chuang chuan thalngul a keng a. Tin, a hnênah chuan lallukhum an pe a, hneh chung leh hneh zêl tûrin a chhuak ta a.
66006003	Tin, chhinchhiahna pahnihna chu a han phelh veleh thilnung pahnihna chuan, “Lo kal la en rawh,” a tih ka hria a.
66006004	Tichuan sakawr dang, mei anga sen a lo chhuak leh a. Tin, a chunga chuang hnênah chuan mi an inthah tawn theih nân lei aṭanga inremna lâksak theihna an pe a.Tin, a hnênah ngûnhnâm lianpui an pe bawk a.
66006005	Tin, chhinchhiahna pathumna chu a han phelh veleh thilnung pathumna chuan, “Lo kal la en rawh,” a tih ka hria a. Tichuan ka han en a, ngaiteh, sakawr dum a lo awm a. A chunga chuang chuan a kutin bûkna a keng a.
66006006	Tin, thilnung palite zîng aṭang chuan awin, “Denari khatin buhpui tehkhâwng khat. Denari khatin chhangphut buh tehkhâwng thum, hriak leh uain erawh chu tichhe suh,” a tih ka hria.
66006007	Tin, chhinchhiahna palina chu a han phelh veleh thilnung palina aw chuan, “Lo kal la en rawh,” a tih ka hria a.
66006008	Tichuan ka han en a, tin, ngaiteh, sakawr dâng a lo awm a, a chunga chuang hming chu ‘Thihnaa,’ a ni. Tin, Mitthite awmna chuan amah chu a rawn zui a. Tin, ngûnhnâm te, ṭâm te, thihna te, leia sakawlhte hmanga tihlum tûrin chu mite hnênah chuan lei hmun lia ṭhena hmun khat chunga thuneihna an pe a ni.
66006009	Tin, chhinchhiahna pangana chu a han phelh veleh maichâm hnuaiah chuan Pathian thu avâng leh an pawm hriattîrna thu avânga thahte thlarau chu ka hmu a.
66006010	Anni chuan aw ring takin, “Aw Lalpa, thianghlim leh dik tak, leia mite chunga phubâ la lo leh rorêl lovin engchen nge i awm dâwn le ?” tiin an au va.
66006011	Tin, an hnênah kawrfual vâr an pe ṭheuh va. Tin, an bawihpuite leh an unaute anmahni ang bawka thah mai tûrte chu thah kim an nih hmâ loh chuan rei lo te chhûng an la nghâk rih tûr a ni tih an hrilh a.
66006012	Tin, chhinchhiahna parukna chu a phelh lai ka en reng a, tin, ngaiteh, lîr nasa takin a lo nghîng ta a. Tin, ni chu sahmul duma siam saiip puan angin a lo dum a, thla pawh chu a pumin thisen ang a lo ni ta a.
66006013	Vân arsite chu theipui kûng thlipuiin a nuai avânga a helte a ṭîl ang maiin leiah an tla ta a.
66006014	Tin, vân chu lehkhabu zial mi ziala a bo angin a bo ta a. Tlâng leh thliarkâr tinrêng chu an awmna aṭanga sawnin an awm ta hlawm a.
66006015	Tichuan leia lal te, mi lian te, mi hausa te, sipai hotu ber te, mi chak te, bawih leh bawih lo tinrêngte chu pûkahte leh tlânga lungpui kârahte chuan an biru a.
66006016	Tin, tlângte leh lungpuite hnênah chuan, “Min delh ula, lalṭhutthlênga ṭhûa hmêl lakah leh Berâmno thinurna lakah min hliah rawh u.
66006017	A thinurna ni râpthlâk tak chu a lo thlen tâk hi, tunge ding thei ang i le?” an ti a.
66007001	Chung thil hnuah chuan khawmualah leh tuifinriatah leh thing rêng rêngah chuan thli rêng a tleh loh nân lei thli pali chu chelhin lei kil lia ding vântirhkoh pali ka hmu a.
66007002	Tin, vântirhkoh dang Pathian nung chhinchhiahna kenga ni chhuahna lam aṭanga lo chhuak ka hmu a. Tin, ani chuan vântirhkoh pali, khawmual leh tuifinriat tihchhiat theihna pêkate hnênah chuan aw ring takin,
66007003	“Kan Pathian bawihte chu an chala kan chhinchhiah hmâ loh zawng khawmual leh tuifinriat leh thingte chu tichhe rih suh u,” tiin a âu va.
66007004	Tin, an chhinchhiah zât chu ka lo hria a, Israela thlahte hnam tina mi 1,44,000 an chhinchhiah tawh a ni.
66007005	Juda hnama mi 12,000 Reubena hnama mi 12,000 Gada hnama mi 12,000
66007006	Asera hnama mi 12,000 Naphtalia hnama mi 12,000 Manasea hnama mi 12,000
66007007	Simeona hnama mi 12,000 Levia hnama mi 12,000 Isakara hnama mi 12,000
66007008	Zebuluna hnama mi 12,000 Josepha hnama mi 12,000 Benjamina hnama mi 12,000 an chhinchhiah tawh a ni.
66007009	Chumi hnuah chuan ka han en a, tin, ngaiteh, mipui tak tuma chhiar sên loh, hnam tin zînga mi te, chi tin zînga mi te, mi tin zînga mi te, ṭawngtin zînga mi te, kawrfual vâr haa tûmkaute kengin lalṭhuphah hmâah leh Berâmno hmâa ding ka hmu a.
66007010	Tin, chûngte chuan aw ring takin, “Kan Pathian lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua hnênah leh Berâmno hnênah chuan chhandamna a awm,” tiin an âu va.
66007011	Tin, vântirhkoh zawng zawngte chu lalṭhutthlêng leh upate leh thilnung palite vêlah chuan an ding a. Lalṭhutthlêng hmâah chuan bawkkhupin,
66007012	“Amen, malsâwmna te, ropuina te, finna te, lâwmthu sawina te, chawimawina te, thiltihtheihna te, chakna te, chatuan chatuanin kan Pathian hnênah awm rawh se,’ Amen.” tiin Pathian chibai an bûk a.
66007013	Tin, upa zînga pakhat chuan ka hnênah, “Hêng kawrfual vâr hâte hi tute nge nia, khawi aṭanga lo kal nge an nih?” tiin mi bia a.
66007014	Kei chuan a hnênah, “Ka pu, nangma’n i hria alâwm,” ka ti a. Tin, ani chuan ka hnênah, “Hêng mite hi hrehawm nasa tak aṭanga lo chhuakte chu an ni a, an kawrfualte Berâmno thisena suin an tivâr ta a.
66007015	Chuvângin, Pathian lalṭhutthlêng hmâah an awm a ni. Achhûn azânin a Hmun Thianghlimah chuan a rawng an bâwl ṭhîn. Tin, lalṭhutthlênga ṭhua chu an zîngah a chêng ang.
66007016	An rilṭâm leh tawh lo vang a, an tuihâl leh tawh hek lo vang a, ni sâ leh mei sâ rêng rêngin a em hek lo vang.
66007017	Berâmno, lalṭhutthlêng laia awma chuan anmahni a vêng ang a, nunna tuikhurahte a hruai dâwn si a. Pathianin an mit ata mittui zawng zawng a hru fai tawh ang,” a ti a.
66008001	Tin, chhinchhiahna pasarihna chu a han phelh veleh dârkâr chanve lai vân chu a reh ṭhuap a.
66008002	Tin, Pathian hmâa vântirhkoh pasarih ding ka hmu a, an hnênah chuan tawtawrâwt pasarih pêk an ni a.
66008003	Tichuan vântirhkoh dang a lo kal a, rangkachak, rimtui hâlna bâwm kengin maichâm kiangah chuan a ding ta a. Tin, mithianghlim zawng zawng ṭawngṭainate nên lalṭhutthlêng hmâa rangkachak maichâm chunga a hlan theih nân thil rimtui tam tak a hnênah an pe a.
66008004	Tin, thil rimtui khu chu vântirhkoh kut aṭangin mithianghlimte ṭawngṭaina nên chuan Pathian hmâah a chho ta a.
66008005	Vântirhkoh chuan thil rimtui hâlna bâwm chu a la a, maichâma meiin a tikhata leiah a paih thla ta a. Tichuan aw ri te, khawpui ri te, kawlphe te, lîrnghîng te a lo awm ta nghâl a.
66008006	Tin, vântirhkoh pasarih, tawtawrâwt pasarih kengte chu hâm tûrin an inbuatsaih ta a.
66008007	Vântirhkoh pakhatna chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a, tichuan rial leh mei, thisen nêna inpawlh a lo awm ta nghâl a. Chûng chu leiah paih thlâkin a awm a. Tin, thing, hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat a kângral a, hlobet hring zawng zawngte pawh a kângral ta bawk a.
66008008	Tin, vântirhkoh pahnihna chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a; tichuan tlâng lianpui meia kâng lai ang chu tuifinriatah paih thlâk a ni a. Tuifinriat hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu thisenah a lo chang ta a.
66008009	Thilsiam, tuifinriata nunna neite chu hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat an thi a, lawngte pawh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat tihchhiat a ni ta bawk a.
66008010	Tin, vântirhkoh pathumna chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a, tichuan arsi lian pui meichher alh ang, vân aṭangin a lo tla a, lui hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat leh tuikhurte chu a delh ta a.
66008011	Chu arsi hming chu khâkna a ni a, tui hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu a lo kha ta a. Tichuan tui chu a lo khâk tâk êm avângin mi tam tak chu tui in avâng chuan an thi a.
66008012	Tin, vântirhkoh palina chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a; tichuan ni hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat, thla pawh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat, arsite pawh hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu khawih danglam a ni a.Tichuan chûngho hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu a thim ta a. Chhûn chu hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat a êng lo va, zân pawh chutiang bawkin a ni ta a.
66008013	Tin, ka han en a, vântirhkoh vânlaizâwla thlâwkin aw ring takin, “Vântirhkoh pathum tawtawrâwt hâm mai tûrte an la awm a, chûngte avâng chuan leia awm hote chung chu a pik e, a pik e, a pik e!” a tih ka hria a.
66009001	Tin, vântirhkoh pangana chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a, tichuan arsi, vân aṭanga leia tla sa ka hmu a. Tin, khuarkhurum mawng nei lo chabi chu a hnênah an pe a.
66009002	Tin, ani chuan khuarkhurum mawng nei lo chu a hawng a; tichuan khuarkhurum aṭang chuan meikhu, rawhtuina mei nasa tak khu ang a chhuak chho va. Tin, khuarkhuruma meikhu avâng chuan ni leh boruak chu an thim ta a.
66009003	Tin, meikhu zîng aṭang chuan khaukhuapte leiah an lo chhuak a. Tin, leia khawmualkaikhuangte’n thiltihtheihna an nei ang hian an hnênah thiltihtheihna pêk an ni a.
66009004	Leia hlobet te, thil hring rêng rêng te, thing rêng rêng te chu tichhe lo tûra thupêk an ni. Amaherawhchu an chala Pathian chhinchhiahna nei lo mihringte chauh tina tûra hrilh an ni.
66009005	Tin, an hnênah chuan mihringte chu tihlum êm lova, thla nga tihrehawm zâwk tûra thu neihna an nei a; an tihhrehawmzia chu khawmualkaikuangin mi a seha a tihhrehawm ang hi a ni.
66009006	Chûng niah chuan miten thihna an zawng ang a, an hmu hauh si lo vang. Thih an châk ang a, nimahsela thihna chuan a tlânsan ang.
66009007	Tin, khaute pianzia chu indona tûra peihsa sakawrte ang an ni. Rangkachak lallukhum ang mai an khum a, an hmai pawh mihringte hmai ang a ni.
66009008	Tin, hmeichhiate sam ang hi sam an nei a, an hâte pawh Sakeibaknei hâte ang a ni.
66009009	Thîr âwmphaw ang hi âwmphaw an nei a, an thla zah ri chu sakawr tawlailîr tam tak indo tûra tlân ri dur dur ang a ni.
66009010	Chûng khaukhuapte chuan khawmualkaikuangte mei ang mei an nei a, an meiahte chuan mi zûk theihna a awm a. Thla nga chhûng mihringte tihnat theihna an nei bawk a.
66009011	Khuarkhurum mawng nei lo tirhkoh chu an chunga lalberah an nei a, a hming chu Hebrai ṭawngin ‘Abaddona’, a ni a, Grik ṭawng erawh chuan a hming chu ‘Apolluona,’ a ni.
66009012	Chungpikna pakhat chu a liam tawh a, ngaiteh, chûng thil hnuah chuan chungpikna pahnih a la awm leh ang.
66009013	Tin, vântirhkoh parukna chuan tawtawrâwt chu a han hâm a, tichuan Pathian hmâa rangkachak maichâm ki palite aṭang chuan aw ka hria a.
66009014	Chu aw chuan vântirhkoh parukna tawtawrâwt keng hnênah chuan, “Euphrates luipuia vântirhkoh pali phuarte kha phelh rawh,” a ti a.
66009015	Tichuan chumi dârkâr leh ni leh thla leh kuma mihring hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat tihlum tûra buatsaih tawh vântirhkoh palite chu phelh an ni ta a.
66009016	Tin, sipai sakawr chung chuangho tam lam chu sîng hlîra hmun sînghnih a ni tih ka hria.
66009017	Tin, inlârnaah chuan sakawrte leh an chunga chuanghote chu hetiangin ka hmu a ni. Mei anga sen, kât anga dumpâwl leh êng âwmphaw an inbel a.Sakawr lûte chu sakeibaknei lûte ang a ni a, an kâ aṭang chuan mei leh meikhu leh kât alh a chhuak a.
66009018	Chûng hripui pathum chuan mihring hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat tihhlum an ni a; mei leh meikhu leh kât an ka aṭanga chhuak chuan tihhlum an ni.
66009019	An thiltihtheihna chu an kâahte leh an meiahte a awm a, an meite chu rûl ang a ni a, lûte an nei a, chu chuan mi an tina ṭhîn a ni.
66009020	Tin, chûng hripuia thi bâng mihringte chuan an kuta an thiltihte chu an sim chuang lo. Ramhuaite leh rangkachak milim te, tangkarua te, dâr te, lung te, thingtea siam engmah hmu thei hlei lo, hre thei hlei lo, kal thei hek lo chibai an bûk ṭhin chu an sim chuang lo.
66009021	An tual thah te, an dawi hman te, an inngaih te, an rûkrukte pawh an sim chuang hek lo.
66010001	Tin, vântirhkoh chak tak dang pakhat chhûma inthuam, vân aṭanga lo chhuk ka hmu a. A lûah chuan chhimbâl a zâm a, a hmai chu nî ang a ni a, a kête chu mei bante ang a ni.
66010002	A kutah chuan lehkhabu zial tê tak tê inphelh sa a awm a. A ke ding lamin tuifinriat a rap a, a vei lamin khawmual a rap a.
66010003	Tin, Sakeibaknei hâhum angin aw ring takin chu vântirhkoh chu a au va. A au zawh chuan khawpuiri pasarihte chuan an awte an chhuah ta a.
66010004	Khawpuiri pasarihte’n an awte an chhuah veleh ka ziak dâwn a; tichuan vân aṭangin awin, “Khawpuiri pasarihte thu sawi chu châr tlat la, ziak suh,” mi rawn ti a.
66010005	Tin, tuifinriat leh khawmual rapa vântirhkoh ka hmuh chuan a kutte chu vân lamah a phar a.
66010006	Tin chatuan chatuana nung renga, vân, a chhûnga thil awmte nên, lei, a chunga thil awmte nên, tuifinriat, a chhûnga thil awmte nêna siamtu chu chhâlin, “Hun a awm tawh lo vang.
66010007	Nimahsela, vântirhkoh pasarihnain a tawtawrâwt a ham dâwn niahte chuan Pathian thurûk chu a kim tawh ang. Chu chu a bawih, a Zâwlneite hnêna chanchin ṭha a lo puan tawh ang kha a ni,” a ti a.
66010008	Tin, vân aṭanga aw ka hriat khân mi rawn be leh a, “Kal la, tuifinriat leh khawmual rapa ding vântirhkoh kuta lehkhabu zial tê tak tê phelh sa saw va la rawh,” mi tih ka hria a.
66010009	Tin, vântirhkoh hnênah chuan ka va kal a, a hnênah, “Lehkhabu zial tê tak tê kha mi pe rawh,” ka ti a. Ani chuan ka hnênah, “La la, ei rawh. Tichuan i pum chu a tikha ang a, i kâah erawh chuan khawizû angin a thlum ang,” a ti a.
66010010	Tichuan vântirhkoh kuta mi lehkhabu zial tê tak tê chu ka la a, ka ei ta a. Tin, ka kâah chuan khawizû angin a thlum a, ka han eizawh chuan ka pum chu a kha zo ta a.
66010011	Tin, ani chuan ka hnênah, “Mi tam tak te, hnam tam tak te, ṭawng tam tak te, lal tam takte chungthu i hrillâwk leh tûr a ni,” a ti a.
66011001	Tin, luang, tehna tiang ang hi mi pe a, tichuan vântirhkoh ding chuan, “Tho la, Pathian Temple leh maichâm nên, a chhûnga betute nên teh rawh.
66011002	Temple pâwn lama hung chhûng kawtlai erawh chu Jentail hnamte hnêna pêk a nih tawh avângin teh tel suh. Anni chuan khawpui thianghlim chu thla sawmli leh thla hnih an rapbet ang.
66011003	Tin, ka thu hretu pahnihte hnênah chuan thiltihtheihna ka pe ang a, tichuan saiip puan sinin chûng ni 1,260 chhûng zawng chuan thu an hrillâwk bawk ang,” a ti a.
66011004	Chûng chu olive thing pahnih leh khâwnvâr dahna pahnih, lei chunga rorêltu Pathian hmâa dingte chu an ni.
66011005	Tin, anni chu tupawhin tihnat an tum chuan an kâ aṭangin mei a lo chhuak a, an hmêlmate chu a kângral ṭhîn. Tin, tupawhin anni chu tihnat tum ang sela chutiang bawka tihhlumin a awm tûr a ni.
66011006	Chûngte chuan an hrillâwk chhûng zawng ruah sûr lo tûra vân tiping tûra thiltihtheihna an nei a. An duh hun apianga thisena chang tûra tuite chunga thiltihtheihna leh khawvêl hi hripui tinrênga hrem tûra thuneihna an nei bawk a.
66011007	Tin, an thu hriattîr an zawh hunah khuarkhurum mawng nei lo aṭanga sakawlh lo chhuak chho chuan anmahni a do vang a, a hneh ang a, a tihlum ang.
66011008	An ruangte chu khawpui ropui kawtthlêrah chuan a awm ang a, chu khawpui ropui chu thlarau lam hmingah chuan ‘Sodom leh Aigupta,’ an ti a ni. Chutah bawk chuan kan Lalpa chu khenbehin a awm kha.
66011009	Tin, mipuite zînga mi te, chitin zînga mi te, ṭawngtin zînga mi te, hnamtin zînga mite’n ni thum leh a chanve an ruangte chu an en ang a, an ruangte chu thlâna phûm an phal lo vang.
66011010	Tin, Zâwlnei pahnihte chuan leia awmte an tih hrehawm ṭhin avângin an thih hunah chuan leia awmte chu an lâwm ang a, hlimna an siam ang a, thilthlâwnpêkte an inthawn bawk ang.
66011011	Ni thum leh a chanve hnuah chuan Pathian hnên aṭangin nunna Thlarau chu an chhûngah a lo lût a, an kein an ding ta a, tichuan a hmutute chu hlauhnain an khat ta a.
66011012	Tin, “Hetah hian lo chho rawh u,” tia vân aṭanga lo chhuak aw ring tak an hria a. Tichuan chhûm zîngah chuan vânah an chho ta a.Tin, an hmêlmate chuan an hmu a.
66011013	Chumi lai tak chuan lîr nasa takin a lo nghîng a, khawpui chu hmun sâwma ṭhena hmun khat a chim ta a. Lîrnghîngah chuan mi 7000 an thi a. Tin, a bâkte chuan an hlau ta êm êm a, vân Pathian chu an chawimawi ta a.
66011014	Chungpikna pahnihna chu a reh tawh a, ngaiteh, chungpikna pathumna chu a lo thleng thuai dâwn e.
66011015	Tin, vântirhkoh pasarihna chuan a han hâm a, tichuan vânah chuan aw ring takte a lo chhuak ta nghâl a, “He khawvêl rorêlnate chu kan Lalpa leh a Krista lalram a lo ni ta, ani chu chatuan chatuanin a lal ang,” tiin.
66011016	Tichuan Pathian hmâa an lalṭhutthlênga upa sawmhnih leh pali ṭhute chuan bawkkhupin Pathian chibai an bûk a.
66011017	“Aw Lalpa Pathian, Engkimtithei, awm mêk leh awm tawh leh lo la kal leh tûr. I thiltihtheihna ropui tak chu hmanga ro a i rêl vângin lâwmthu kan hrilh a che.
66011018	Hnamte chu an thinur a, tin, i thinur chu a lo thleng ve thung a. Mitthi ro rêlsak hun chu a lo thleng ta a. I bawih te, i zâwlnei te leh mi thianghlim te, i hming zahtu, mi lian leh mitête hnêna lâwmman pêk hun chu a lo thleng ta bawk a. Tin, lei tichhetute tihchhiat ve thung hun chu a lo thleng bawk a ni,” an ti a.
66011019	Tin, vâna Pathian Temple chu a lo inhawng a, tichuan a Temple-a a thuthlunna bâwm chu a lo lang a. Tin, kâwlphe te, aw te, khawpui ri te, lîrnghîng te, rial nasa tak te a lo awm ta a.
66012001	Tin, chhinchhiahna ropui tak vânah a lo lang a. Hmeichhia, nîa inthuam, a ke hnuaia thla awm, arsi sâwm leh pahnih nei lallukhum khum a lo awm a.
66012002	Chu mi chuan nau a pai a, a vei a, a hring tûr na tuarin a ṭap a.
66012003	Tin, chhinchhiahna dang vânah a lo lang leh a. Ngaiteh, dragon sen lianpui, lu sarih leh ki sâwm nei, a lûa lallukhum pasarih khum a lo awm a.
66012004	A mei chuan vân arsi hmun thuma ṭhena hmun khat chu a hnûka leiah a paih thla ta a. Tin, a hrin huna a ei theih nân dragon chu hmeichhe nau hring ṭêp hmâah chuan a ding reng a.
66012005	Tin, fapa, hnam zawng zawng chunga thîr tianga rorêl tûr a hring a. Tin, a fa chu Pathian hnênah, a lalṭhutthlêngah chuan lâk chohvin a awm ta a.
66012006	Ni 1260 an châwm theih nân hmeichhia chu mihring chên lohnaa a hmun neih, Pathianin a buatsaihsakah chuan a tlân a.
66012007	Tin, vânah chuan indona a lo awm a. Mikaela leh a vântirhkohte chuan dragon chu an do va, dragon leh a vântirhkohte pawh chuan an do ve a.
66012008	Dragon leh a vântirhkohte chuan an hneh ta lo va, an hmun chu vânah a awm ta bawk hek lo.
66012009	Tin, Dragon lianpui, hmâna rûl kha an paih chhuak a. Chu chu hmâna rûlpui, khawvêl pumpui bumtu Diabola leh Setana tia an koh kha a ni. Ani chu leiah an paih thla a, a tirhkohte pawh an paih thla tel ve a.
66012010	Tin, vânah chuan aw ring takin, “Tûnah chuan kan unaute hêktu, kan Pathian hmâa achhûn azâna hêk ṭhîntu chu paih thlâk a nih tâk avângin chhandamna leh thiltihtheihna leh kan Pathian lalram leh a Krista thuneihna chu a lo thleng ta.
66012011	Berâmno thisen avâng leh an thu hriattîrna thu avângin ani chu an hneh a ni. Thih ngam khawpin an nunna an ngainêp bawk a.
66012012	Chuvângin aw vânte leh a chhûnga awmte u, lâwm rawh u! Diabola chuan hun tlêm tê chauh a nei tih a inhriat avânga thinur êm êma in hnêna a lo chhuk tâk avângin leia awmte leh tuifinriat chung chu a pik e,” an tih ka hria.
66012013	Tin, dragon chuan leia paih thlâk a ni tih a inhriat veleh fapa hringtu hmeichhia chu a tiduhdah ta a.
66012014	Tichuan, mi chên lohnaa ama hmunah chuan a thlawh luh theih nân hmeichhia chu mupui lian tak thla khinghnih pêk a ni a. Chutah chuan rûlpui hmuh phâk lohvah hun khat leh hunte leh hun chanve chhûng zawng châwm a ni ang.
66012015	Tin, tuilianin a len bo theih nân hmeichhe hnungah chuan tuilian ang mai hian rûlpui chuan a kâ aṭangin tui a pik chhuak a.
66012016	Nimahsela, leiin hmeichhia chu a ṭanpui a, lei chuan a kâ a âng a, dragon-in a kâ aṭanga a pik chhuah tuilian chu a lem zo ta a.
66012017	Tichuan dragon chu hmeichhe chungah chuan a lo thinur ta êm êm a. A thlah la awmte, Pathian thupêkte zâwma Isua Krista thupuan chhuah pawmtute chu do tûrin a kal ta a.
66013001	Tichuan tuifinriat ṭiauphovah chuan ka ding ta a. Tin, Sakawlh ki sâwm leh lu sarih nei, tuifinriat aṭanga lo chhuak ka hmu a. A kîahte chuan lallukhum sâwm a awm a, a lûahte chuan Pathian sawichhiatna hming a awm bawk a.
66013002	Ka Sakawlh hmuh chu Keitê ang a ni a, a kête chu Savawm ke ang a ni a, a kâ chu Sakeibaknei kâ ang a ni. Tin, dragon chuan a hnênah a thiltihtheihna leh a lalṭhutthlêng leh thuneihna nasa tak a pe a.
66013003	Tin, a lu pakhat chu thihpui khawp hiala hliam angin ka hmu a; nimahsela, a thihpui khawp hial tûra hliam chu a dam ta a. Tichuan leia mi zawng zawngin sakawlh chu mak an ti a, an zui a.
66013004	Tin, Sakawlh hnêna thuneihna petu dragon chu bawkkhupin chibai an bûk a. Tin, “Sakawlh ang hi tunge awma tunge do thei awm?” tiin sakawlh pawh chu bawkkhupin chibai an bûk a.
66013005	Tin, thil ropui takte leh Pathian sawichhiatna thu sawina kâ a hnênah pêk a ni a, thla sawmli leh pahnih chhûng che tûrin thuneihna pêk a ni bawk a.
66013006	Tichuan a hming leh a awmna hmun leh vâna awmhote chu sawichhiaa Pathian dodâla sawichhiain a kâ a âng ta a.
66013007	Tin, mi thianghlimte a do leh a hneh phal a ni a. Chi tinrêng te, mi tinrêng te, ṭawng tinrêng te, hnam tinrêngte chunga thuneihna a hnênah pêk a ni bawk a.
66013008	Tichuan leia awm zawng zawng, leilung pian tirha talh tawh Berâmno Nunna bua hming ziak loh apiang chuan bawkkhupin chibai an bûk ang.
66013009	Tupawhin beng an neih chuan hre rawh se.
66013010	Tupawh sala awm tûra mite hruaitu chu, amah pawh sala awm tûra hruaiin a awm ve ang. Tupawhin ngûnhnâma mi a thah chuan amah chu ngûnhnâma thah ve tûr a ni. Hetah hian mi thianghlimte chhelna leh rinna pawimawhna a awm.
66013011	Tin, sakawlh dang lei aṭanga lo chhuak ka hmu a, berâmno angin ki pahnih a nei a, dragon angin a ṭawng a.
66013012	Sakawlh hmasa zâwk thuneihna zawng zawng kha a mit hmuhah a hmang a. Lei leh a chhûnga awm zawng zawngte chu sakawlh hmasa zâwk, thihpui khawp hial tûra hliam dam leha chu bawkkhupin chibai a bûktîr bawk a.
66013013	Tin, chhinchhiahna ropui tak, vân aṭanga mei tlâktîrte pawh mihringte mithmuhah a ti a.
66013014	Leia awmte hnênah sakawlh, ngunhnâma hliam hnu la dam chawimawi nân ama lim siam tûr a ni tih sawiin sakawlh mithmuha thilmak ti tûra thu a hmuh thilmak chuan leia awmte chu a bum bawk a.
66013015	Tin, sakawlh lim chu thâwkna pe tûra thiltihtheihna pêk a ni a.Tichuan sakawlh lim chu a lo ṭawng theiin, sakawlh lim bawkkhupa chibai bûk lo apiang a tihlum thei bawk ang.
66013016	Tin, mi zawng zawng, alian atê, a hausa a retheiin, bawih leh bawih lote pawh, an kut dinglamah emaw, an chalah emaw chhinchhiahna a neihtîr hlawm a.
66013017	Chu chu Sakawlh hming chhinchhiahna emaw, a hming emaw, a hming number emaw neite chauh lo chuan tuma’n engmah an lei leh an hralh theih loh nân a ni.
66013018	Hetah hian finna a awm. Hriatthiamna nei chuan Sakawlh number chu chhût rawh se, mi pakhat number a ni si a.Tin, chu pa number chu 666 a ni.
66014001	Tin, ka han en a, ngaiteh, Berâmno, Zion tlânga ding leh an chala a Pa hming ziak, mi 1,44,000 a hnênah ka hmu a.
66014002	Vân aṭangin aw ka hria a, tui tam tak ri ang leh khawpui ri nasa tak ang a ni.Tin, ṭingṭang tumtute’n an ṭingṭang an tum ri ka hre bawk a.
66014003	Lalṭhutthlêng hmâah leh thilnung palite leh upate hmâah chuan hla thar ni âwm tak hi an sa a. Tin, lei aṭanga tlan tawh mi 1,44,000 te chauh lo kha chuan tuma’n chu hla chu an zir thei lo.
66014004	Chûngte chu an thianghlim avângin hmeichhe laka intibawlhhlawh lote an ni. Chûngte chuan Berâmno chu a kalna apiangah an zui a. Mihringte zîng aṭanga tlan an ni a, Pathian leh Berâmno tâna rah hmasate an ni.
66014005	Pathian lalṭhutthlêng hmâah chuan sawisêlbo an nih avângin an kaah bumna thu a chhuak ngai lo.
66014006	Tin, leia awmte hnênah leh hnam tinrêng te, chi tinrêng te, ṭawng tinrêng te, mi tinrêngte hnêna tlângaupui tûra chatuan chanchin ṭha nei vântirhkoh dang vânlaizâwla thlâwk ka hmu a.
66014007	Ani chuan aw ring takin, “A rorêl hun chu a lo thlen tâk avângin Pathian chu ṭih ula, ama hnênah ropuina hlân rawh u. Vân te, lei te, tuifinriat te, tuihnate siamtu chu bawkkhupin chibai bûk rawh u,” a ti a.
66014008	Tin, vântirhkoh dangin a rawn zui a, “Khawpui ropui tak Babulon chu a sualna tinrêng thinurna uain, hnam zawng zawng intîrtu chu a tlâwm ta, a tlâwm ta,” a ti a.
66014009	Vântirhkoh pathumna chuan anni chu a rawn zui a, aw ring takin, “Tupawh Sakawlh leh a lim pathiana biaa an chalah emaw, an kutah emawa chhinchhiahna nei,
66014010	chu mite ngei chuan Pathian thinurna uain, a thinurna nova mi engmah pawlh lohva thlitluh chu an in ang. Vântirhkoh thianghlimte mithmuh leh Berâmno mithmuhah mei leh kâta nghaisakin an awm bawk ang.
66014011	Tin, chûng mite nghaisakna meikhu chu chatuan chatuanin a chho vang a, sakawlh leh a lim bawkkhupa chibai bûktute, a hming chhinchhiahna nei apiangte pawh chuan achhûn azânin chawlh rêng an nei lo vang,” a ti a.
66014012	Mi thianghlim, Pathian thupêkte vawngtute leh Isua ringtute chhel tûra kohna chu hei hi a ni.
66014013	Tin, vân aṭangin awin ka hnênah, “Ziak rawh. Tûn hnuah chuan mithi, Lalpaa thite chu an nihlawh ang. A ni, Thlarauvin, ‘An thawhrimnate chu an chawlhsan tawh ang; an thiltihte chuan a rawn zui dâwn si a,’ a ti e,” a tih ka hria a.
66014014	Tichuan ka han en a, tin, ngaiteh, chhûm vâr ka hmu a. Tin, chhûm chungah chuan mi pakhat, ‘Mihring Fapa ang tak,’ a lûa rangkachak lallukhum khuma a kuta favah hriam tak kenga ṭhu ka hmu bawk a.
66014015	Tin, Hmun thianghlim aṭang chuan vântirhkoh dang a lo chhuak a, chhûm chunga ṭhu hnênah chuan aw ring takin, “I favah kha lek chhuak la, seng rawh. A seng hun i tân a lo thlen tâk hi. Leia mi seng tûr chu a hmin ta e,” a ti a.
66014016	Tichuan chhûm chunga ṭhu chuan a favah chu leiah a thlâk a, leia mi chu seng a ni ta a.
66014017	Tin, vântirhkoh dang, vâna Hmun thianghlim aṭang chuan a lo chhuak leh a, ani pawh chuan favah hriam tak a nei a.
66014018	Tin, vântirhkoh dang, mei chunga thiltihtheihna neitu chu maichâm aṭangin a lo chhuak leh a. Ani chuan favah hriam tak neitu chu a au va, aw ring takin, “I favah hriam tak kha lek chhuak la, grêp rahte khu a hmin chhuah vek tawh avângin leia grep hrui rah bâwrte khu seng khâwm rawh,” a ti a.
66014019	Tichuan vântirhkoh chuan a favah chu leiah a thlâk a, leia grêp chu a seng khâwm a. Pathian thinurna grêp sâwrna khur zau takah chuan a theh lût a.
66014020	Tin, khawpui pâwn lama grêp sâwrna khurah chuan rah sâwr a ni a, tichuan grêp sâwrna khur aṭang chuan thisen a luang chhuak a, kilometer 320 vêl laia zau, sakawr thîrbarh thlenga thûk a ni.
66015001	Tin, vânah chhinchhiahna dang, ropui tak leh mak tak ka hmu a. Chûng chu vântirhkoh pasarih hripui hnuhnûng ber pasarihte neitu chu an ni. Chûngah chuan Pathian thinurna chu a famkim tawh si a.
66015002	Tin, dârthlalang tuifinriat ni âwm tak, mei nêna inpawlh ka hmua. Sakawlh leh a lim leh a chhinchhiahna leh a hming number chunga hnehna changte chu Pathian ṭingṭangte kenga tuifinriat dârthlalang angah chuan ding ka hmu bawk a.
66015003	Pathian bawih Mosia hlâ leh Berâmno hlâ an sa a. “Lalpa Pathian, engkimtithei, I thiltihte chu a ropuiin a mak a. Nang, mithianghlimte Lalber, I kawngte chu a felin a dik a ni.
66015004	Aw Lalpa, tunge nangmah ṭih lo vang a, I hming chawimawi lo vang? Nang chauh i thianghlim si a. Hnam zawng zawng an lo kal ang a, I rorêlnate chu tihlan a nih tawh avângin I hmâah bawkkhupin chibai an rawn bûk ang che,” tiin.
66015005	Chumi hnuah chuan ka han en a, tin ngaiteh, vânah hriatpuina puan in Temple chu hawn a ni a.
66015006	Tichuan Hmun Thianghlim aṭang chuan hremna pasarih nei vântirhkoh pasarihte chu puan zaisîn fai leh êng tak sina an âwma rangkachak kâwnghrêna inhrêngin an lo chhuak a.
66015007	Tin, thilnung pali zînga pakhat chuan vântirhkoh pasarihte hnênah chuan, Pathian chatuan chatuana nung renga thinurnaa khat rangkachak berhbu pasarih a pe a.
66015008	Tin, Temple chu Pathian ropuina leh a thiltihtheihna khuin a khat ta a. Vântirhkoh pasarihte hripui pasarih chu a zawh fel hmâ loh zawng Temple chhûngah chuan tumah an lût thei lo.
66016001	Tin, Hmun Thianghlim chhûng aṭang chuan aw ring takin, vântirhkoh pasarihte hnênah chuan, “Kal ula, Pathian thinurna berhbute chu leiah leih baw rawh u,” a tih ka hria a.
66016002	Tichuan a pakhatna chu a kal a, a berhbu chu leiah a leih bua a. Sakawlh chhinchhiahna nei mihringte leh a lim bawkkhupa chibai bûktute chungah chuan pân rim chhe na takah a chang ta a.
66016003	Tin, vântirhkoh pahnihna chuan a berhbu chu tuifinriatah a leih bua a; tichuan mithi thisen angin a lo awm ta a; thil nung tinrêng tuifinriata awmte chu an thi ta vek a.
66016004	Tin, vântirhkoh pathumna chuan a berhbu chu luiahte leh tuikhur tuiahte a leih bua a, tichuan thisenah an chang ta a.
66016005	Tin, tuite vântirhkoh chuan, “Aw Lalpa fel tak, hêng thilte chunga ro i rêl avâng hian, nang, awm mêk leh awm tawh leh lo la awmtûra chu i ni e.
66016006	Anni chuan mi thianghlimte leh Zâwlnei thisen an chhuah si a. Tin, nangin in tûra thisen vêk i pêk thung hi, in tlâk an ni rêng e,” a tih ka hria a.
66016007	Tin, maichâm aṭang chuan aw dangin, “A ni tak e, Lalpa Pathian, Engkimtithei, i rorêlte chu a dikin a fel a ni,” a tih ka hria a.
66016008	Tin, vântirhkoh palina chuan a berhbu chu nîah a leih bua a, tichuan meia mihring em ût tûra thiltihtheihna a hnênah pêk a ni a.
66016009	Chutichuan mihringte chu sa tak em uhin an awm a; chûng hripuite chunga thiltitheitu Pathian hming chu an sawichhia a. An sim chuang lova, amah chu an chawimawi hek lo.
66016010	Tin, vântirhkoh pangana chuan a berhbu chu sakawlh lalṭhutthlêngah a leih bua a, tichuan a lalram chu a lo thim ta vek a. Tin, a nat avângin an lei an seh a.
66016011	An nâte leh an pânte avângin vân Pathian chu an sawichhia a, an thiltihte chu an sim chuang lo.
66016012	Tin, vântirhkoh parukna chuan a berhbu chu Euphrates luipuiah chuan a leih bua a, tichuan khawchhak lam lalte lo kalna tûr kawng chu peihsa a nih theih nân a tui chu a kangchat ta a.
66016013	Tin, dragon kâ aṭang leh sakawlh kâ aṭang leh zâwlnei dik lo kâ aṭang chuan thlarau bawlhhlawh pathum, chungû ang lo chhuak ka hmu a.
66016014	Chûng chu ramhuaiho thlarau, chhinchhiahnate ti ṭhînte an ni. Anni chu Pathian Engkimtitheia ni ropuia indonaa hruaikhâwm tûrin leia lalte hnênah leh khawvêl zawng zawngah an kal chhuak a.
66016015	“Ngaiteh, rûkru angin ka lo kal e, ngaihvena a silhfên inbel chu a nihlawh e. Chutilochuan saruakin a awm ang a, a zahna an hmu dah ang e,” a ti a.
66016016	Tin, hmun pakhat Hebrai ṭawnga, ‘Armagedon,’ an tihah chuan a hruai khâwm ta a.
66016017	Tin, vântirhkoh pasarihna chuan a berhbu chu boruakah a leih bua a, tichuan vân Temple Lalṭhutthlêng aṭangin, “Tihzawh a ni ta,” tiin aw ring tak a lo chhuak a.
66016018	Tin, ri te, khawpui ri te, kâwlphê te, lîrnghîng nasa tak te a lo awm a. Lîrnghîng chuti kauva nasa leh ropui chu leia mihringte awm aṭangin chutianga nasa rêng rêng ala awm ngai lo.
66016019	Tichuan khaw ropui chu hmun thumah a lo inṭhen a, hnamte khawpuite chu a lo chim a. Tin, a thinur nasatna uain no chu intîr tûrin Babulon khaw ropui chu Pathianin a hre ta reng a.
66016020	Tin, thliarkâr tinrêngte chu an tlân bo va, tlângte pawh hmuh tûr a awm ta lo va.
66016021	Tin, rial lian pui pui Kg. 40 dâwn laia rit vân aṭangin mihringte chungah a tla a, tin, chu hripui chu a nasat êm avângin mihringte chuan rial hripui avâng chuan Pathian an sawichhe ta a.
66017001	Tin, vântirhkoh pasarih, berhbu pasarih kengte zînga pakhat chu lo kalin mi bia a, “Hawh teh, tui tam taka ṭhu nawhchizuar ropui tak chunga hremna chu ka entîr ang che.
66017002	Leia lalte chuan ani chu an ngai ṭhîn a, leia awmte pawh chu a mi ngaih chînna uain chuan hrai ruihin an awm ṭhîn,” a ti a.
66017003	Chutichuan vântirhkoh chuan mi chên lohna hmunah Thlarauvin mi kalpui a. Tin, Pathian sawichhiatna hminga khat, lu sarih leh ki sâwm nei sakawlh sen chunga chuang hmeichhia ka hmu a.
66017004	Chu hmeichhia chuan puan sen duk leh sen lâr a sin a. Rangkachak leh lung man tam leh tuikeplungtein a inchei a. Rangkachak no, Pathian huat zâwng thil tenawmte, a mi ngaih chînna thil bawlhhlawha khat a keng a,
66017005	A chalah chuan, THURUK “BABULON KHAW ROPUI, LEIA NAWHCHIZUARTE LEH THIL TENAWMTE NU,” tia hming ziak a awm a.
66017006	Tin, hmeichhia, mi thianghlimte thisen leh Isua tâna martarho thisena rui ka hmu a. Ka hmuh veleh mak ka ti êm êm mai a.
66017007	Tichuan vântirhkoh chuan ka hnênah, “Engvângin nge mak i tih? Hmeichhia leh a phurtu sakawlh, lu sarih leh ki sâwm nei thurûk chu ka hrilh ang che.
66017008	Sakawlh i hmuh kha a awm tawh zet a, a awm leh ta lo va. Tin, Khuarkhurum mawng nei lo aṭangin a lo chhuak chho vang a, boralnaah a kal ang. Tin, leia chêng, leilung pian tirh aṭanga Nunna Bua hming ziak lohte chuan sakawlh awm tawh zeta awm leh ta a lova, a lo awm leh tûr chu an hmuh hunah mak an la ti ang.
66017009	Hetiang kawng hian mifing rilru chuan a hrethiam ang, lu sarihte chu hmeichhe ṭhutna tlâng pasarih chu an ni.
66017010	Lal pasarih pawh an ni bawk a, pangate chu an tlâwm tawh a, pakhat chu a la awm a, pakhat chu a la lang rih lo va, a lo lan hunah pawh rei lo te chhûng chauh awm tûr a ni.
66017011	Tin, sakawlh awm tawh zeta awm leh ta lova ngei pawh kha a pariatna a ni a, lal pasarihte zînga mi kha a ni nghe nghe a, boralnaah a la kal ang.
66017012	Ki sâwm i hmuhte kha lal sâwm, lalram la nei lote an ni a, amaherawhchu, sakawlh nên dârkâr khat chhûng lalte angin thuneihna an la chang ang.
66017013	Chûng lalte chuan thu khat vuain an thiltihtheihna leh thuneihna chu sakawlh an pe ang.
66017014	Chûng lalte chuan Berâmno chu an do vang a, tin, Berâmno chu hotute Hotu leh lalte Lal a nih avângin anni chu a hneh ang. Tin, a hnêna awm, koh te, thlan te, rinawm te chuan an hneh bawk ang,” a ti a.
66017015	Tin, vântirhkoh chuan ka hnênah, “Nawhchizuar ṭhutna tui i hmuhte kha, mi te, mipui te, hnam te, ṭawngte an ni.
66017016	Sakawlh chunga ki sâwm i hmuhte khân nawhchizuar chu an hua ang a, engmah nei lo leh saruakin an siam ang a, a sa pawh an ei ang a, meiin an hâl ang.
66017017	Pathian thute chu a thlen kim hmâ loh chuan a duhzâwng an tihna tûr leh thu khat an lo vuakna tûr leh an lalram chu sakawlh hnêna an pêkna tûrin Pathianin an thinlungah a tîr si a.
66017018	Tin, i hmeichhe hmuh kha khawpui ropui leia lalte chunga rorêltu chu a ni,” a ti a.
66018001	Chûng hnuah chuan vântirhkoh dang, thuneihna nasa tak nei vân aṭanga lo chhuk ka hmu a, a ropuinain lei chu a ên a.
66018002	Tin, ani chuan aw ring takin, “Babulon khaw ropui chu a tlâwm ta, a tlâwm ta. Ramhuaite awmna leh thlarau bawlhhlawh tinrêng awm khâwmna leh sava bawlhlawh leh huatthlala tinrêngte tân, tân in a lo ni ta a.
66018003	A mi ngaih chîn vânga thinurna uain chu hnam zawng zawngin an in tawh si a. Lei lalte chuan ani chu an ngai ṭhîn a, leia sumdâwngtute chuan a nawmsak bâwlna thiltihtheihna chu an hausak phah ṭhîn.” tiin a au va.
66018004	Tin, vân aṭangin aw dangin heti hian a sawi ka hria. “Ka mite u, a sualnaahte in tel lohna tûr leh a hremnate in tuar ve lohna tûrin a chhûng aṭangin lo chhuak rawh u.
66018005	A sualnate chuan vân a tawng ta hial a, A thiltih fel lote pawh chu Pathianin a hre reng si a.
66018006	Anin a pêk che u ang ngei khân pe thung ula, a thiltihzia ang zêl chu a leh hnihin thungrûl ula. A chawhpawlhna novah chuan a tân a leh hnihin chawhpawlhsak rawh u.
66018007	A intihropui leh a intihnawmsakzia ang zêl khân nghaisain tilungngai thung rawh u. A thinlung chuan, ‘Lalnuah ka ṭhu a ni, hmeithai rêng ka ni lo va, lungngaihna ka hmu ngai lo vang,’ a ti si a.
66018008	Chuvângin ni khat chauhvah a hremna, thih te, lungngaih te, ṭâm te chu alo thleng vek ang a, meia hâlralin a awm bawk ang, a ro rêlsaktu, Lalpa Pathian chu a chak si a.”
66018009	Tin, leia lal, a ngai ṭhîntute leh a nawmsak bâwlpui ṭhîntute chuan a kâng khu chu an hmuh hunah chuan an ṭap anga an chiau vak vak ang.
66018010	Nghaisakna a tuar chu hlauh vânga hla taka dingin, ‘Babulon khawpui ropui, khawpui nghet chu a chung a pik e, a pik e. Dârkâr khat chauhvah i chunga rorêlna chu a lo thleng ta si,’” an la ti ang.
66018011	“Tin, leia sumdâwngtute chu tuma’n an zawrh sumte an lei tâk loh avângin a chunga ṭapin an lungngai ang.
66018012	An zawrh sumte chu rangkachak te, tangkarua te, lung man tam te, tuikeplung te, puan zai sin te, puan sen duk te, maimaw puan te, puan sen lârte nên. Thing rimtui tinrêng te, sainghova siam thil tinrêng te, thing hlu tak tak leh dâr leh thîr leh sailungvâra siam thil tinrêng te nên.
66018013	Thakthing te, thil rimtui hâl chi te, hriak rimtui te, beraw te, uain te, olive hriak te, chhangphut dip tak te, wheat te, sebâwng te, berâm te nên. Sakawr te, tawlailîr te, taksa leh mihring nunna te nên a ni.
66018014	Rah, i rilruin a châkte chuan a kal bosan che a, thil hlû leh mawi zawng zawng chuan a boralsan che a; chûngte chu i hmu leh tawh ngai tawp lo vang.
66018015	Chûng thila sumdâwngtu, amah avânga lo hausate chu nghaisakna a tuar chu hlauh vânga hla taka dingin an ṭap ang a, an chiau vak vak ang.
66018016	“Khaw ropui, puan zai sîn leh puan sen duk leh puan sen lâr sina, rangkachak leh lung man tam leh tuikeplunga inchei chu a chung a pik e, a pik e,
66018017	Dârkâr khat chauhvah sum chuti zozai chu engmah lo a lo chan vek tâk hi,” an ti a. Lawng hotu apiang te, lawng mi te, tuipuia sumdâwng apiang te chu hla takah an ding a.
66018018	A kâng khu chu an hmuhin, “He khawpui ropui tluk hi eng khuapui nge awm ang?” tiin an au va.
66018019	Tin, ṭap leh chiau vak vak chungin, “A muk avânga tuifinriata lawng neitute hausakna khawpui ropui chu a chung a pik e, a pik e! Dârkâr khat chauhvah engmah lo a lo nih tâk hi!” tia auvin an lû ah vaivut an phul a.
66018020	“Aw, vân leh nangni mi thianghlimte, Apostol thianghlimte leh zâwlnei thianghlimte u, hemi avâng hian lâwm rawh u, Pathianin a chungah in phubâ a lâksak tâk che u hi,” tiin.
66018021	Tin, vântirhkoh chak tak hian râwt sawmna lung lian pui ang hi lung a la a, tuifinriatah a paih thla a, “Babulon khawpui ropui chu hetiang hian na taka paih thlâk a ni ang a, tuma’n an hmu leh tawh tawp lo vang.
66018022	Ṭingṭang tumtuho te, thil tum thiamho te, phênglâwng tumtuho te, tawtawrâwt puhote thâwm chu nangmahah hriat a ni leh tawh tawp lo vang. Themthiam, kawng tinrênga themthiamte pawh i chhûngah an hmu leh tawh tawp lo vang a, râwt sawmna lung ri pawh i chhûngah an hre leh tawh tawp lo vang.
66018023	Khâwnvar êng pawh i chhûngah a êng tawh ngai lo vang a, moneitu leh mo thâwm pawh i chhûngah an hre tawh ngai lo vang. Nangmaha sumdâwngtute chu leia mi liante an ni a, i dawithiamnain hnam zawng zawng bum an ni si.
66018024	A chhûngah chuan Zâwlnei leh mi thianghlimhote leh leia thah zawng zawngte thisen chu an hmu a,” a ti a.
66019001	Chûng hnûah chuan vânah mipui tam takte aw ring tak hian, “Halleluia, chhandamna te, ropuina te, zahawmna te thiltihtheihnate chu Lalpa kan Pathian ta a ni.
66019002	A rorêlnate chu a dikin a fel a, nawhchizuar ropui tak, a mi ngaih chîn vânga lei tikhawlotu chungah ro a rêl a, a bawihte thisen chhuak phubâ chu a lâk tâk hi.
66019003	Tin, ‘Halleluia,’ a khu chu chatuan chatuanin a chho vang,” an ti leh a.
66019004	Tin, upa sawmhnih leh pali leh thilnung palite chuan lalṭhutthlênga ṭhu Pathian chu bawkkhupa chibai bûkin, “Amen, Halleluia,” an ti a.
66019005	Tin, lalṭhutthlêng aṭangin aw a lo chhuak a, “Nangni a bawih zawng zawng, amah ṭihtu mi lian leh mi tête u, kan Pathian chu fak rawh u,” tiin.
66019006	Tin, mipui tam tak aw ang leh tui tam tak ri ang leh khawpui nasa tak ri angin, “Halleluia, Lalpa Pathian, engkimtitheia chuan ro a rêl tak hi.
66019007	Hlim takin lâwm ila, amah i chawimawi ang u. Berâmno nupui neih chu a hun ta si a, a nupui pawh chu amah ngei a inpeih tawh,” a tih ka hria.
66019008	Berâmno nupui chu a inthuam nân puan zai sîn ṭha tak, fai tak leh êng tak pêk a ni. Puan zai sîn ṭha tak chu mi thianghlimte thil fel tih a ni.
66019009	“Vântirhkoh chuan ka hnênah, “‘Berâmno nupui neihna ruaiṭheha sâwmte chu an nihlawh e,’ tiin ziak rawh,” mi ti a. Tin, ka hnênah, “Hêng thu hi Pathian thu dik a ni,” a ti bawk a.
66019010	Tichuan chibai bûk tûrin a ke bulah ka bawkkhup a. Ani chuan ka hnênah, “Heti chuan ti suh khai, kei chu Isua thupuan chhuah neitu nangmah leh i unaute bawihpui ka ni alâwm. Bawkkhupin Pathian chibai bûk rawh, Isua thupuan chhuah chu Pathian thu hrillâwkna thlarau a ni si,” a ti a.
66019011	Tin, vân inhawng ka hmu a, tin, ngaiteh, sakawr vâr leh a chunga chuang, ‘Rinawm leh Diktaka,’ an tiha chu ka hmu bawk a. Ani chuan ro a rêl leh mi a dovin dik takin a ti ṭhîn.
66019012	A mitte chu meialh ang a ni a, a lûah lallukhum tam tak a khum a. Tin, hming ziak, amah chauh lo chuan tumahin an hriat loh a nei a.
66019013	Thisena hnim puan a sin a, a hmingah chuan “Pathian Thûa,” an ti a.
66019014	Tin, vâna sipaihote chuan puan zai sîn ṭha tak, vâr tak leh fai tak sinin sakawr vâr chungahte chuangin an zui a.
66019015	A kâ aṭangin ngûnhnâm hriam tak a chhuak a, chu chu hnamte a sahna tûr a ni. Tin, thîr tiangin an ro a rêl ang. Pathian Engkimtitheia thinur nasatna grêp sâwrna khurah chuan a rap sâwr ang.
66019016	Tin, a puanah leh a malpuiah chuan, “LALTE LAL LEH LALPATE LALPA,” tia hming ziak a awm a.
66019017	Tin, niah khian vântirhkoh ding ka hmu a, tin, ani chuan vânlaizâwla sava thlâwk zawng zawng hnênah chuan aw ring takin, “Pathian ruai ropui tak ṭhehnaah chuan lo kal khâwm rawh u.
66019018	Lal sa te, sipai hotu sa te, mi chak sa te, sakawr leh a chunga chuang sa te, mi zawng zawng bawih leh bawih lo, a lian a tê pawh an sa in ei theihna tûrin lo kal rawh u,” tiin a au va.
66019019	Tin, sakawlh te, leia lalho te leh an sipaihote chu sakawr chunga chuanga kha do tûr leh a sipaihote do tûra an kal khâwm ka hmu a.
66019020	Sakawr chunga chuanga chuan sakawlh leh zâwlnei dik lo, sakawlh mit hmuha chhinchhiahna ti ṭhîna chu a man a. Chumi chhinchhiahna hmang chuan sakawlh chhinchhiahna nei leh a lim chibai bûktute a hruai bo ṭhîn. An pahnih chuan kâta kâng meidîlah chuan a nung chungin a paih a.
66019021	A la bângte chu sakawr chunga chuanga kâ aṭanga chhuak ngûnhnâm chuan sahhlum an ni ta a, sava zawng zawngte chu an sate eiin an puar ta vek a.
66020001	Tin, vântirhkoh khuarkhurum mawng nei lo chabi leh khaidiat lian pui kengin vân atanga lo chhuk ka hmu a.
66020002	Dragon, rûlpui hmâna mi kha a man a. Amah chu Diabola leh Setana a ni. Ani chu kum sângkhat atân vântirhkoh chuan a phuar a,
66020003	khuarkhurum mawng neilovah chuan a paih lût a. A khâr khum a, kum sângkhat chu a vei hmâ loh chuan hnamte a bum leh tawh lohna tûrin a châr hnân ta a. Chumi hnûah chuan rei lo tê atân chhuah leh rih tûr a ni.
66020004	Tin, lalṭhutthlêngte ka hmu a, a chungahte chuan mi an ṭhû a, an hnênah chuan rorêlna pêk a ni a. Tin, Isua thu an puan avâng leh Pathian thu avânga lu tante thlarau ka hmu a. Hêng mite hian sakawlh leh a lim chibai an bûk lo va, an chalah leh an kutahte sakawlh chhinchhiahna an nei hek lo. Chûngho chu an lo nung a, Krista nên kum sângkhat ro an rêl a.
66020005	Mitthi dangte erawh chu kum sângkhat chu a vei hmâ loh chuan an la nung rih lo va. Chu chu thawhlehna hmasa chu a ni.
66020006	Thawhlehna hmasaa tel chu an nihlawhin an thianghlim a ni. Chûngho chungah chuan thih hnihna chuan thiltihtheihna rêng a nei lo. Nimahsela, Pathian leh Krista Puithiamte an ni ang a, amah nên kum sângkhat rorêlin an awm zâwk ang.
66020007	Tin, kum sângkhat chu a vei hunah chuan Setana chu a tânna aṭang chuan chhuahin a awm ang a,
66020008	lei kil lia hnam te, Gog leh Magog chu buma indonaa hruai khâwm tûrin a kal chhuak ang. Chûngho tamzia chu tuipuia ṭiauvut ang mai an ni.
66020009	Lei vâng dâpin an kal chho va, mi thianghlimte riah bûk leh khawpui duhawm tak chu an hual ta a. Tin, vân aṭangin Pathian hnêna mi mei a lo tla a, anni chu a kângral ta a.
66020010	Anmahni bumtu Diabola chu sakawlh leh zâwlnei dik lo awmna mei leh kât dîlah chuan an paih ta a. Tichuan chatuan chatuanin achhûn azâna nghaisakin an awm ang.
66020011	Tin, lalṭhutthlêng vâr ropui tak leh a chunga ṭhua chu ka hmu a. A hnên aṭang chuan lei leh vân an tlan bo va, an tân hmun rêng a awm ta lo va.
66020012	Tin, mithite, alian atêin, Pathian hmâa ding ka hmu a. Lehkhabute chu keu a ni a, tin, lehkhabu dang keu a ni bawk a, chu chu Nunna Bu a ni. Tichuan mithite chu lehkhabutea ziak an thiltih ang zêla rêlsakin an awm ta a.
66020013	Tuifianriat chuan a chhûnga mithi awmte chu a chhuahtîr a, thihna leh mithite awmna chuan an chhûnga mithi awmte chu an chhuahtîr bawk a. Tin, mi tin an thiltih ang zêla rêlsakin an awm ta a.
66020014	Thihna leh mithite awmna chu mei dîlah paihin an awm a. Chu chu thih hnihna chu a ni.
66020015	Tu pawh Nunna Bua hming ziak an hmuh loh apiang mei dîlah paihin an awm bawk a.
66021001	Tin, vân thar leh lei thar ka hmu a, vân hmasa leh lei hmasa chu a boral tawh a, tuifianriat pawh a awm tawh lo.
66021002	Tin, kei, Johana hian khaw thianghlim Jerusalem thar chu, a pasal tâna mo a inchei anga peih diamin Pathian hnêna mi vân aṭanga lo chhuk ka hmu a.
66021003	Lalṭhutthlêng aṭangin aw ring takin, “Ngaiteh, Pathian chênna chu mihring zîngah a lo awm ta. Ani chu an hnênah a awm ang a, anni chu a mite an ni ang. Pathian ngei chu an hnênah a awm ang a, an Pathian a ni bawk ang.
66021004	An mita mittui zawng zawng Pathianin a hrufai ang a, thihna a awm leh tawh lo vang. Lungngaih te, ṭah te, natte pawh A awm leh tawh hek lo vang, thil hmasate chu an boral tawh si a,” a tih ka hria a.
66021005	Lalṭhutthlênga ṭhu chuan, “Ngaiteh, thil engkim ka siam thar e,” a ti a. Tin, ka hnênah “Ziak rawh, hêng thu hi a rinawmin a dik si a,” a ti a.
66021006	Tin, ka hnênah, “Tihzawh a ni ta. Kei Alpha leh Omega, a Bul leh a Tâwp ka ni. Tuihâl apiang hnênah nunna tuikhura mi a thlâwnin ka pe ang.
66021007	A hnehtu chuan thil zawng zawng a rochung ang. Kei a Pathian ka ni ang a, a ni chu ka fapa a ni ang.
66021008	Amaherawhchu, mi dâwih te, ring lo te, tenawm te, tualthat te, inngaih chîng te, dawithiam te, milem bia te, dawthei zawng zawngte chan tûr chu mei leh kâta kâng dîlah chuan a awm ang; chu chu thih hnihna chu a ni,” a ti a.
66021009	Tin, vântirhkoh pasarih, hripui hnuhnûng ber pasariha khat berhbu pasarih kengte zînga pakhat chu ka hn.ênah a lo kal a. Ani chuan, “Hawh teh, mo, Berâmno nupui chu ka entîr ang che,” tiin mi bia a.
66021010	Ani chuan Thlarauvin tlâng lian pui sâng takah mi kalpui a, khawpui ropui Jerusalem khaw thianghlim chu Pathian hnêna mi vân aṭanga lo chhuk mi entîr a.
66021011	Chu khawpui chuan Pathian ropuina a nei a. A ênzia chu lung hlu man tam ber ang, jaspi lung ang, krustal lung anga fîm a ni.
66021012	Kulh ropui tak sâng tak a nei a, kawngkapui sâwm leh pahnih a nei a. Kawngka bulahte chuan vântirhkoh sâwm leh pahnih an awm a, chûng kawngkapuiahte chuan hming ziak a awm a, chûng chu Israel thlahte hnam sâwm leh hnam hnihte hming a ni.
66021013	Chhak lam pangah kawngkapui pathum, hmâr lam pangah kawngkapui pathum, chhim lam pangah kawngkapui pathum, thlang lam pangah kawngkapui pathum a awm a.
66021014	Chu khawpui kulh chuan lungphûm sâwm leh pahnih a nei a, chûngah chuan Berâmno Apostol sâwm leh pahnihte hming a chuang a.
66021015	Tin, mi betu chuan khawpui leh a kawngkapuite leh a kulh chu tehna tûrin rangkachak luang tiang a keng a.
66021016	Khawpui chu kil li neiin a awm a, a dung lam chu a vâng lam chen a ni. Khawpui chu luang tiang chuan a teh a, 2400 Km a ni a, a dung lam leh a vâng lam leh a sân lam chu a inang a ni.
66021017	Tin, a kulh chu mihring tehna hmangin vântirhkoh chuan a teh a 216ft a ni.
66021018	Tin, a kulh chu jaspi lunga siam a ni a, khawpui chu dârthlalang fîm tak ang maia rangkachak hlanga siam a ni.
66021019	Chu khawpui kulh lung phûmte chu lung man tam chi tinrênga cheimawi a ni. Lungphûm hmasa ber chu jaspi lung a ni a, a pahnihna chu saphir lung a ni a, a pathumna chu kalkidon lung a ni a, a palina chu emerald lung a ni a.
66021020	A pangana chu sardonuk lung a ni a, a parukna chu sardion lung a ni a, a pasarihna chu krusolite lung a ni a, a pariatna chu birul lung a ni a, a pakuana chu topaz lung a ni a, a sâwmna chu krusopra lung a ni a, a sâwm leh pakhatna chu Jacinth lung a ni a, a sâwm leh pahnihna chu amethusto lung a ni.
66021021	Tin, kawngkapui sâwm leh pahnih chu tuikeplung sâwm leh pahnih a ni. Kawngkapui tinte chu tuikeplung pakhat ṭheuhva siam a ni a, tin, chu khawpui kawtlai chu rangkachak hlang, dârthlalang en tlang theih ang mai hi a ni.
66021022	Tin, chu khawpuiah chuan Temple rêng ka hmu lo va, Lalpa Pathian Engkimtitheia leh Berâmno chu a Temple a ni.
66021023	Chu khawpui chu Pathian ropuinain a ên avângin a ên tûrin nî a ngai lo va, thla pawh a ngai hek lo, tin, a êng chu Berâmno chu a ni.
66021024	Tin, chûng mite zînga hnam, Pathianin a chhandamte chu a êngah chuan an awm ang a, leia lalte chuan an ropuina leh an zahawmna an la lût ang.
66021025	Chutah chuan zân rêng a awm dâwn loh avângin a kawngkapuite chu chhûnah an khâr tawp lo vang.
66021026	Tin, hnamte ropuina leh zahawmna an la lût ang a.
66021027	Thil bawlhhlawh rêng a lût hauh lo vang a, Pathian huatzâwng titute leh dâwt hmang pawh an lût hek lo vang. Berâmno Nunna bua hming an ziakte chauh an lût ang.
66022001	Tin,vântirhkoh chuan nunna tui, lui thianghlim tak, krustal lung anga fîm, Pathian leh Berâmno lalṭhutthlêng aṭanga lo chhuak mi entîr a.
66022002	Khawpui kawtthlêr lai tak, chu lui kam tuakah chuan Nunna thing, chi hrang sâwm leh pahniha rah, thla kipa rah a awm a. Chu thing hnahte chu hnamte damna tûr a ni.
66022003	Tin, ânchhia rêng rêng a awm leh tawh lo vang a, Pathian leh Berâmno lalṭhutthlêng chu a awm tawh zâwk ang. Tichuan a bawihte chuan a rawng an bâwl ang a,
66022004	a hmêl an hmu ang a, a hming chu an chalah a chuang bawk ang.
66022005	Zân a awm leh tawh lo vang a, tin, khâwnvâr leh ni êng a ngai tawh lo vang. Lalpa Pathian chuan anmahni a ên dâwn si a, tin, chatuan chatuanin ro an rêl ang.
66022006	Tin ani chuan ka hnênah, “Hêng thu hi a rinawmin a dik a ni. Zâwlnei thianghlimte Lalpa Pathian chuan thil lo thleng thuai tûrte chu a bawihte hnêna entîr tûrin a vântirhkoh a tîr a ni.
66022007	Ngaiteh, ka lo kal thuai dâwn e. He lehkhabu hrilhlâwkna thute pawmtu chu an nihlawh e,” a ti a.
66022008	Tin, kei, Johana, hêng thil hmutu leh benga hretu chu ka ni. Ka hriata ka hmuh chuan, hêng thil mi entîrtu vântirhkoh ke bulah Pathian chibai bûka bûk tûrin ka bawkkhup a.
66022009	Ani chuan ka hnênah, “Heti chuan ti suh khai, kei chu nangmah leh i unau zâwlnei leh he lehkhabu thu pawmtute bawihpui mai ka ni alâwm, bawkkhupin Pathian chibai bûk zâwk rawh,” mi ti a.
66022010	Tin, ani chuan ka hnênah, “He lehkhabu hrilh lâwkna thute hi zêp suh, a hun chu a lo thleng dâwn tawh si a.
66022011	Mi fel lo chu fel lovin awm reng sela, mi bawlhhlawh chu bawlhhlawhin awm reng rawh se. Mi fel chu felin awm reng rawh se, mi thianghlim chu thianghlimin awm reng rawh se.
66022012	Ngaiteh, ka lo kal thuai dâwn e, mi tin an thiltih ang zêla pêk tûrin ka lâwmman ka hnênah a awm.
66022013	Kei Alpha leh Omega, a bul leh a tâwp, a Hmasaber leh a Hnuhnûng bera chu ka ni.
66022014	A thupêk zâwmtute chu an nihlawh e, Nunna thing kalpawh theihna leh kawngkâte kal tlanga khawpuia luh theihna an nei dâwn si a.
66022015	Pâwnah chuan ui te, dawithiam te, inngaih chîng te, tualthat te, milem bia te, dâwt ngaina leh dâwt hmang apiangte chu an awm a.
66022016	“Kei Isua hian hêng thilte hi kohhrante tân in hnêna hriattîr tûrin ka vântirhkoh chu ka rawn tîr a ni. Davida bulpui leh a thlah, vârparh Arsi êng tak chu ka ni,” a ti a.
66022017	Thlarau leh mo chuan, “Lo kal rawh,” an ti a. A hria apiangin, “Lo kal rawh,” ti rawh se. Tuihâl apiang lo kal sela, a duh apiangin nunna tui hi a thlâwnin la rawh se.
66022018	He lehkhabu hrillâwkna thu hria apiang ka hriattîr e. Tupawhin hêng thu hi a belhchhah chuan he lehkhabua hremna ziakte hi Pathianin a chungah a belhchhah ve ang.
66022019	Tin, tupawhin he hrillâwkna lehkhabu thûa mi a lâk bo chuan Nunna bua mi leh Khawpui Thianghlima mi leh he lehkhabua thil inziaktea a chan chu Pathianin a la bo ve ang.
66022020	Hêng thu hriattîrtu hian, “A ni, matheilovin ka lo kal thuai dâwn e,” a ti a. Amen, a ni, lo kal ta che, Lalpa Isu.
66022021	Kan Lalpa Isua Krista khawngaihna chu in zaa hnênah awm rawh se. Amen.
